languages.text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Мы бесконечно уважаем его за мудрость, а он платит нам за это вниманием и добротой". {n}Голос девушки звучит тепло, но затем в нем прорезается обвиняющая нотка.{/n} "Хотела бы я, чтобы прочие ценили его так же, как мы. Для моего почтенного предка был тяжелым ударом приказ покинуть вашу свиту".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, Ваша милость. Мы бесконечно уважаем его за мудрость, а он платит нам за это вниманием и добротой". {n}Голос девушки звучит тепло, но затем в нем прорезается обвиняющая нотка.{/n} "Хотела бы я, чтобы прочие ценили его так же, как мы. Для моего почтенного предка был тяжелым ударом приказ покинуть вашу свиту".

languages.text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Мы бесконечно уважаем его за мудрость, а он платит нам за это вниманием и добротой". {n}Голос девушки звучит тепло, но затем в нем прорезается обвиняющая нотка.{/n} "Хотела бы я, чтобы прочие ценили его так же, как мы. Для моего почтенного предка был тяжелым ударом приказ покинуть вашу свиту".

traits.locale_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed ancestor when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

It was a terrible blow to my esteemed ancestor when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

"Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

languages.text: 「仰るとおりです、陛下。私達は彼の知性を大いに尊敬しておりますし、彼も思いやりあふれる心遣いを見せてくださいます」{n}アスタルチアは熱心に説いていたが、非難するような声色に変わる。{/n}「他の方々にも私達と同等の評価をしていただけるといいのですが。尊敬する祖先が従者を辞めるよう言い渡されたときは、強打されたかのような苦痛でした」
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「仰るとおりです、陛下。私達は彼の知性を大いに尊敬しておりますし、彼も思いやりあふれる心遣いを見せてくださいます」{n}アスタルチアは熱心に説いていたが、非難するような声色に変わる。{/n}「他の方々にも私達と同等の評価をしていただけるといいのですが。尊敬する祖先が従者を辞めるよう言い渡されたときは、強打されたかのような苦痛でした」

languages.text: “当然，大人。我们非常尊重他的智慧。他对我们的关注与仁慈，让我们受益匪浅。”{n}她热情地说道，但接下来的话语却带着指责的意味。{/n}“如果其他人也能像我们一样尊重他就好了。当我尊敬的曾祖收到命令，不得不离开您的舰队时，那对他而言是个沉重的打击。”
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

traits.locale_text: “当然，大人。我们非常尊重他的智慧。他对我们的关注与仁慈，让我们受益匪浅。”{n}她热情地说道，但接下来的话语却带着指责的意味。{/n}“如果其他人也能像我们一样尊重他就好了。当我尊敬的曾祖收到命令，不得不离开您的舰队时，那对他而言是个沉重的打击。”

languages.text: «Absolutamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sentimos un gran respeto por su sabiduría y él nos lo paga con atención y amabilidad». {n}El tono afable de su voz da paso a una acusación.{/n} «Ojalá los demás supieran apreciarle tanto como nosotros. Fue un durísimo golpe para mi estimado antepasado que le ordenara que abandonara su séquito».
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

traits.locale_text: «Absolutamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sentimos un gran respeto por su sabiduría y él nos lo paga con atención y amabilidad». {n}El tono afable de su voz da paso a una acusación.{/n} «Ojalá los demás supieran apreciarle tanto como nosotros. Fue un durísimo golpe para mi estimado antepasado que le ordenara que abandonara su séquito».

languages.text: « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons le plus grand respect pour sa sagesse, et il n'a jamais fait preuve que de bonté et de prévenance à notre égard, » {n}déclare-t-elle d'une voix chaleureuse, avant de poursuivre sur un ton accusateur.{/n} « J'aimerais que d'autres l'estiment également à sa juste valeur. Mon honorable aïeul a beaucoup souffert d'avoir été exclu de votre entourage. »
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons le plus grand respect pour sa sagesse, et il n'a jamais fait preuve que de bonté et de prévenance à notre égard, » {n}déclare-t-elle d'une voix chaleureuse, avant de poursuivre sur un ton accusateur.{/n} « J'aimerais que d'autres l'estiment également à sa juste valeur. Mon honorable aïeul a beaucoup souffert d'avoir été exclu de votre entourage. »

languages.text: "Unbedingt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir respektieren ihn sehr für seine Weisheit, und er widmet uns dafür Aufmerksamkeit und Güte", {n}sagt sie warm, doch dann nimmt ihre Stimme einen anklagenden Ton an.{/n} "Ich wünschte, andere würden ihn ebenso wertschätzen wie wir. Es war ein schwerer Schlag für meinen geschätzten Urgroßvater, als ihm befohlen wurde, Euer Gefolge zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Unbedingt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir respektieren ihn sehr für seine Weisheit, und er widmet uns dafür Aufmerksamkeit und Güte", {n}sagt sie warm, doch dann nimmt ihre Stimme einen anklagenden Ton an.{/n} "Ich wünschte, andere würden ihn ebenso wertschätzen wie wir. Es war ein schwerer Schlag für meinen geschätzten Urgroßvater, als ihm befohlen wurde, Euer Gefolge zu verlassen."

languages.text: "Haşa {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Abelard'ın bilgeliğine saygımız sonsuz. O da ilgi ve nezaketiyle bizi karşılıksız koymuyor." {n}Sözcükler, ağzından samimiyetle çıkıyor. Ardından sitemli bir tavır takınıyor.{/n} "Keşke herkes, onun kıymetini bizim kadar bilebilseydi. Maiyetinizden ayrılmasının emredilmesi, saygın atama ağır bir darbe oldu."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly, but then her voice takes on an accusing tone.{/n} "I wish others appreciated him as much as we do. It was a terrible blow to my esteemed forebear when he was ordered to leave your retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Hâşâ {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Abelard'ın bilgeliğine saygımız sonsuz; o da bize ilgi ve nezaketiyle hakkımızı ödüyor," {n}diyor samimice. Ardından, sitemli bir tavır takınıyor. "Keşke herkes de onun kıymetini bizim kadar bilebilseydi.{/n} "Maiyetinizden ayrılmasının emredilmesi, saygın dedem için ağır bir darbe oldu."
